entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries and periods of freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
